column5: Anybody fly into Grayson Lake with Rusty Meyers outfitters? What was your impressions? We are thinking of taking an August trip there. How was the fishing? Thanks in advance.
Can't comment on the outpost camp, but I paddled through Grayson a few years back.Even alone in a canoe I caught tons of walleye. From my recollection it's a very good fishing lake.
